entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Diagnostic is unclear when passing ref readonly to ref readonly parameter using 'ref' #73459
  • Stack overflow in `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Binder.BindBinaryPattern` when getting compiler diagnostics in Roslyn.sln #73457
  • Visual Studio operates on outdated cache after git pull again #73455
  • Rename class property changes all occurrences of property name in all comments in project. #73453
  • Hot reload fails to flow generic constraints to the inherited class #73448
  • CSC : error CS0041: Unexpected error writing debug information -- 'Insufficient memory to continue the execution of the program.' #73447
  • Test plan for "First-class Span Types" #73445
    .NET 9
  • Formatting not working #73443

Closed

  • Raw string literals guide line is shifted when using tabs #64230

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove array allocations for formatting rules. #73458
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • net9.0 reference assemblies #73454
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • For validation only #73449
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add "First-class Span Types" feature status #73446
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add more "ref in async" tests #73444
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async

Merged

  • Optimize suppress operations during formatting. #73456
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Produce less string allocs while formatting documents #73452
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve memory allocs in interval trees #73451
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add dynamic registration for razor and cshtml files #73369
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make placement of raw string guide line independent of the space chars used #73435
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Port tests of "Invert if" refactoring to `VerifyCS/VB` #73440
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Small tweaks to speed up ctrl-click #73442
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do less work computing diff-merge results in the common case. #73430
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce LOH allocs when applying code fixes. #73424
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid LOH allocation in text synchronization #73425
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Partial properties: attributes #73437
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove virtual from 'SourceMethodSymbolWithAttributes.SyntaxNode' #73433
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Net9 Reference Assemblies #73423
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Emit and roundtrip underlying instance field #73407
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Switch Roslyn protocol types to System.Text.Json serialization #73207
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update msbuild version to 17.3.4 #73283
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Ignore drive casing when comparing on windows platforms #73380
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run final fix-all code-cleanup phase out of process. #73357
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Recognize 'allows ref struct' constraint in VB compiler #73429
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Always use DiagnosticHelper.Create for diagnostics with options #73339
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
